title: Clockwork Empires Build 31
description:
Clockwork Empires Build 31


Install & play!


Take on the role of a Junior Bureaucrat (Colonial Grade), sent forth to seek fame, promotions, and natural resources to feed the ravenous maw of Imperial Industry & Commerce. Build a prosperous colony, fill it with magnificent factories worked by oppressed labourers, and harness the awesome power of steam through fearsome machines invented by determined men and women of Science! History is yours to seize for fame and fortune, for Science, and for the Queen and the glory of the Clockwork Empires!
GAMEPLAY & FEATURES:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Build A colony and manage the characters WHO Live in it, each with Unique histories: The colony set in A Victorian Steampunk ERA, as well as the Lower, Upper and middle class Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ characters, have Their own Memories and unfolding Futures Which are shaped by your choices. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Free-form Goals: Every scenario is what you make of the it. As you colonize an unknown land, objectives are given by "The Empire", but you may choose to align with another faction - or none at all - if so you desire. There are rewards and Consequences for each Decision. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Cosmic Horror, Factories, Booze, Science, Et Cetera: Complete with all the Elements for an Industrial revolution, A colonial Society Pushed too far will Break down and Unleash horrors such as cultists, marauding Fish -people, AXE murderers, and things Darker still from Beyond the Stars. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sharing and Successive Multiplayer: Supporting up to four players Online, or Via A Turn-based 'Round Robin' Successive Multiplayer, the Saved-game file option encourages Other Player Bureaucrats to further diverge histories and continue building & expanding those colonies.
